item.title: 加密货币托管初创公司BitGo计划在美国IPO中筹集约2.01亿美元
item.description: 加密货币托管初创公司BitGo周一在监管文件中披露，其计划通过在美国首次公开募股（IPO）筹集最多2.01亿美元资金。【原文：BitGo is seeking to raise up to $201 million in its U.S. initial public offering, the crypto custody startup said in a regulatory filing on Monday.】

item.title: 特朗普提出的信用卡利率上限提案将如何重塑消费信贷格局
item.description: 美国总统特朗普支持的信用卡利率一年上限提案，可能降低部分消费者的借贷成本，但也可能限制信贷供应、压低银行利润，并重塑消费信贷的经济格局。【原文：A proposed one-year cap on credit card interest rates backed by U.S. President Donald Trump could reduce borrowing costs for some consumers but also limit credit availability, pressure bank profits and reshape the economics of consumer lending.】

item.title: QXO获得由阿波罗和淡马锡牵头的18亿美元追加融资
item.description: QXO公司周一宣布，在阿波罗全球管理公司、淡马锡及其他投资者的牵头下，成功获得18亿美元的额外融资。亿万富翁布拉德·雅各布斯旗下的这家企业正瞄准整合中的美国建筑产品行业，谋求收购机会。【原文：QXO said on Monday it secured an additional $1.8 billion in financing led by Apollo Global Management , Temasek and other investors, as billionaire Brad Jacobs' firm targets acquisitions in the consolidating U.S. building-products industry.】

item.title: Duolingo首席财务官马特·斯卡鲁帕任职近六年后即将离职
item.description: Duolingo周一宣布，首席财务官马特·斯卡鲁帕将在任职近六年后离职，这标志着一位关键高管的离去——正是他的助力，使这家语言学习应用开发商得以成功上市。【原文：Duolingo said on Monday that Chief Financial Officer Matt Skaruppa will step down after nearly six years in the role, marking the departure of a key executive who helped the language-learning app maker go public.】

item.title: 分析师在Medline成功完成重磅IPO后给予看涨评级
item.description: 多家券商于周一开始覆盖Medline公司，普遍给予看涨评级，看好其供应链实力和品牌渗透力。此前该公司于去年12月扩大了美国首次公开募股规模——该发行规模创下2025年全球之最。【原文：Brokerages began coverage of Medline with largely bullish ratings on Monday, betting on supply chain strength and brand penetration, following the firm's upsized U.S. initial public offering in December - the biggest globally in 2025.】

item.title: 莫德纳预计2025年销售额达19亿美元，下调成本预测
item.description: 莫德纳公司周一表示，预计2025年销售额将达到约19亿美元，接近此前16亿至20亿美元预测区间的上限，但远低于新冠疫情期间的营收水平。【原文：Moderna said on Monday it expects to report around $1.9 billion in sales for 2025, putting it near the upper end of its previously projected $1.6 billion to $2 billion forecast but well below revenue levels achieved during the COVID-19 pandemic.】

item.title: 英国科技大臣欢迎英国通信管理局就Grok平台的性化图像展开调查
item.description: 英国科技大臣利兹·肯德尔周一表示，她欢迎媒体监管机构英国通信管理局（Ofcom）对X平台展开调查，因其旗下Grok人工智能聊天机器人生成性化图像。【原文：British technology minister Liz Kendall said on Monday she welcomed the media regulator Ofcom's investigation into X over sexualised imagery produced by the Grok AI chatbot】

item.title: 印度HCL科技公司季度营收超预期，得益于银行业与科技领域双重助力
item.description: 印度软件服务出口商HCLTech周一公布的第三季度营收超出预期，主要得益于其银行业和技术领域的业务表现。【原文：Indian software services exporter HCLTech reported a higher-than-expected third-quarter revenue on Monday on the back of performance in its banking and technology verticals.】

item.title: 露露柠檬预计假日季度营收和利润将达到此前预测区间的上限
item.description: 运动服饰零售商露露柠檬周一表示，受假日季强劲需求推动，预计第四季度营收和利润将达到此前预测区间的上限。【原文：Apparel retailer Lululemon Athletica said on Monday it expects fourth-quarter revenue and profit to be toward the high end of its previous forecast range on the back of strong demand during the holiday season.】

item.title: 晨间竞标：鲍威尔毫不留情
item.description: 当今美国及全球市场中真正重要的因素【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 华尔街期货因担忧美联储独立性而下跌；金融股走低
item.description: 周一华尔街期货走低，特朗普政府对美联储的抨击重燃市场对美国央行独立性的担忧，而拟议的信用卡利率一年上限则拖累金融类股。【原文：Wall Street futures retreated on Monday as the Trump administration's attack on the Federal Reserve revived concerns over the U.S. central bank's independence, while a proposed one‑year cap on credit card interest rates weighed on financial shares.】

item.title: 贸易公司抢先美国大公司拿下首批委内瑞拉石油交易
item.description: 全球石油贸易商在争夺委内瑞拉原油供应权的竞赛中率先胜出，抢在美国能源巨头之前锁定这片全球最大原油储备国的潜在利润丰厚商机。这些美国企业因顾虑信贷和法律风险而持谨慎态度。【原文：Global oil trading houses have emerged as early winners in the race to control Venezuelan crude flows, getting ahead of U.S. energy majors wary of credit and legal risks and securing a potentially lucrative business opportunity in the country with the world's largest crude reserves.】

item.title: 参议院报告称联合健康集团采取激进手段增加医保支付金额，《华尔街日报》报道
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一报道，美国参议院一个委员会正在调查健康保险公司联合健康集团的经营行为。该委员会指出，联合健康集团曾采取激进手段收集诊断信息，以期提高联邦医疗保险优势计划的支付额度。【原文：Health insurer UnitedHealth Group used aggressive tactics to gather diagnoses that can boost Medicare Advantage payments, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing a U.S. Senate committee investigating the company's practices.】

item.title: 英国监管机构就Grok平台的性化图像问题对X平台展开调查
item.description: 英国媒体监管机构通信管理局（Ofcom）周一启动对埃隆·马斯克旗下X平台的调查，以确定该平台是否履行了保护英国民众免受可能在英国构成违法内容侵害的职责。【原文：Britain's media regulator Ofcom on Monday launched an investigation into Elon Musk's X to determine whether it has complied with its duties to protect people in the UK from content that could be illegal in the UK.】

item.title: 优步在亚利桑那州面临性侵诉讼，其安全记录受到审视
item.description: 优步本周将在亚利桑那州凤凰城面临庭审，一名女性指控通过该应用预约的司机对其实施性侵，并就此提起诉讼。【原文：Uber is set to face trial this week in Phoenix, Arizona, in a lawsuit brought by a woman who says she was sexually assaulted by a driver she booked through the app.】

item.title: 印度TCS季度营收超预期，人工智能需求推动增长
item.description: 印度最大软件服务公司塔塔咨询服务公司周一公布的第三季度营收超出预期，人工智能驱动的需求持续攀升。【原文：Tata Consultancy Services , India's largest software services firm, posted a bigger-than-expected third-quarter revenue on Monday as artificial intelligence-led demand ramped up.】

item.title: 大众汽车在中国销量跌至第三，快速增长的吉利汽车实现反超
item.description: 行业数据显示，大众汽车去年在中国市场的销量被吉利汽车超越，跌至第三位。此前在2024年，大众汽车已将其在世界最大汽车市场长达十年的霸主地位让给了比亚迪。【原文：Volkswagen was overtaken by Geely Auto in sales in China last year, dropping to third place after losing its decade-long dominance in the world's largest auto market to BYD in 2024, industry data showed.】

item.title: 华尔街对特朗普提出的信用卡利率上限提案能否推进持怀疑态度
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普提出的将信用卡利率上限设为10%的提案虽引发广泛关注，但华尔街分析师指出，该提案需通过立法程序，且获批可能性微乎其微。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's proposal to cap credit card interest rates at 10% has grabbed headlines but would require legislation and has slim odds of passing, Wall Street analysts said.】

item.title: 特朗普呼吁限制信用卡利率后，美国金融股下跌
item.description: 周一美国金融股在盘前交易中下跌，此前总统特朗普呼吁对信用卡利率实施为期一年的上限，此举威胁到银行及其他贷款机构的关键收入来源。【原文：U.S. financial stocks fell in premarket trading on Monday after President Donald Trump called for a one-year cap on credit card interest rates, threatening a key revenue stream for banks and other lenders.】

item.title: 达索航空投资法国国防人工智能独角兽哈玛坦公司
item.description: 法国航空航天集团达索航空正牵头对初创企业哈玛丹人工智能公司进行2亿美元融资，随着地缘政治竞争加剧，国防领域正竞相利用人工智能技术。【原文：French aerospace group Dassault Aviation is leading a $200 million funding round in startup Harmattan AI as the defence sector races to leverage artificial intelligence amid intensifying geopolitical competition.】

item.title: 依维柯与PlusAI扩大合作，在西班牙开展自动驾驶卡车测试
item.description: 自动驾驶卡车初创企业PlusAI周一宣布，将启动南欧首个重型自动驾驶卡车测试项目，并扩大与依维柯集团旗下品牌IVECO的合作。【原文：Self-driving truck startup PlusAI said on Monday it would launch Southern Europe's first programme to test heavy-duty autonomous trucks, expanding its partnership with Iveco Group brand IVECO.】

item.title: 高盛首席经济学家称美联储决策不会受鲍威尔面临刑事调查威胁影响
item.description: 高盛首席经济学家扬·哈齐乌斯周一表示，美联储主席面临刑事起诉威胁将加剧市场对央行独立性的担忧，但他预计美联储将继续基于数据作出决策。【原文：Goldman Sachs’ chief economist Jan Hatzius said on Monday that a criminal indictment threat facing the Federal Reserve chairman would reinforce central bank independence worries, but he expected the Fed to continue to make decisions based on data.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁格陵兰引发黄金之外避风港的追寻，国防领域亦然
item.description: 投资者纷纷加码黄金和欧洲防务类股票，以应对美国总统特朗普威胁要控制格陵兰岛的言论。他们担忧由此引发的地缘政治裂痕可能导致北约解体、全球秩序崩溃并损害美元价值。【原文：Investors have piled fresh bets on gold and European defence stocks in response to U.S. President Donald Trump's threats to take control of Greenland, fearing a geopolitical rift that could end NATO, shatter the global order and damage the dollar.】

item.title: 星链竞争对手欧洲卫星通信公司向空客订购340颗OneWeb卫星
item.description: 由法国和英国政府支持的卫星运营商欧洲卫星通信公司（Eutelsat）已向空客公司订购340颗卫星，用于更新和扩展其OneWeb低轨道卫星网络。两家公司周一宣布了这一消息。【原文：Eutelsat , the satellite operator backed by the French and the British governments, has placed an order with Airbus for 340 satellites to refresh and extend its OneWeb low-Earth-orbit network, the two companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 英国JD Sports在美国核心市场推出人工智能商业服务
item.description: 英国运动服饰零售商JD Sports Fashion周一宣布，其最大市场美国地区的顾客将能够使用人工智能平台搜索并购买其产品。【原文：British sportswear retailer JD Sports Fashion said on Monday customers in the United States, its largest market, will be able to use AI platforms to search for and purchase its products.】

item.title: 瑞银拒绝瑞士银行新规提案，提议成本更低的替代方案
item.description: 瑞银周一驳回了政府为加强银行监管而提出的方案，这些方案是在瑞信倒闭后提出的。瑞银表示这些方案将削弱瑞士的竞争力，并主张采取成本更低的替代方案。【原文：UBS on Monday rejected government proposals to strengthen regulations for the bank in the wake of the collapse of Credit Suisse, saying they would make Switzerland uncompetitive and arguing instead for less costly alternatives.】

item.title: 投资者对美联储生死攸关的决战感到焦虑
item.description: 投资者表示，全球最具影响力的中央银行的独立性正面临公开考验。【原文：The independence of the world's most powerful central bank is openly on the line, investors said.】

item.title: 英国IQE公司预测2025年国防与人工智能需求将推动盈利增长
item.description: 英国IQE公司周一表示，2025财年营收和调整后核心利润预计将达到预测区间的上限，需求主要来自军工国防、人工智能、数据中心及手机等领域。【原文：Britain's IQE expects revenue and adjusted core profit for fiscal 2025 at the upper end of its forecasts, the semiconductor wafer maker said on Monday, with demand driven by the military and defence, AI, data centres, and handset sectors.】

item.title: BESI报告显示第四季度初步订单价值达2.5亿欧元
item.description: BE半导体工业公司——欧洲最大的芯片封装设备供应商之一——周一初步报告称，其第四季度订单环比增长。【原文：BE Semiconductor Industries , one of Europe largest suppliers of chip assembly equipment, preliminarily reported a sequential rise in fourt-quarter orders on Monday.】

item.title: 海尼根首席执行官因销售疲软且投资者不满而辞职
item.description: 海尼根首席执行官多尔夫·范登布林克周一意外辞职。此前他领导这家荷兰啤酒巨头六年，并在制定新战略仅数月后便卸任。当前啤酒行业正竭力刺激消费者增加啤酒购买量。【原文：Heineken's CEO Dolf van den Brink resigned unexpectedly on Monday after six years of leading the Dutch brewer and only a few months after setting its new strategy, as the industry battles to get drinkers buying more beer.】
